explain: $$\begin{eqnarray*}\overrightarrow{A} \cdot \overrightarrow{B} &=& (2 \cdot 1) + (1 \cdot -2) + (-1 \cdot 2) = 2\\\Vert A \Vert \Vert B \Vert \cos \theta &=& 2\\\sqrt{6} \sqrt{9} \cos \theta &=& 2\\\theta &=& 74.2^{\circ}\end{eqnarray*}$$$$\begin{eqnarray*}\overrightarrow{C} &=& \overrightarrow{A} \times \overrightarrow{B} \\&=&\left|\begin{matrix}1 & -1 \\-2 & 2\end{matrix}\right| i -\left|\begin{matrix}2 & -1 \\1 & 2\end{matrix} \right| j +\left|\begin{matrix}2 & 1 \\1 & -2\end{matrix}\right| k\\&=& 0 i - 5 j - 5 k \\&& \text{berada di bidang $yz$}\end{eqnarray*}$$
